overview:
Akhil Gupta, founder of Techeomania, discovered Techeomania on 5th August 2011 which offers the latest technology news and reviews for the latest products and gadgets launched along with tips,tricks,coming soon launches and more.

Akhil is a freelancer, blogger, writer and a student who is currently pursuing his Bachelor of Technology(B.Tech) in the field of Computer Science and is interested in the latest tech buzz that’s going around the world and writes about the latest in the world of blogging, SEO, gadget reviews, security tips, reviews, news and more and loves blogging!
